original_body_lines: The folks at T&S Productions USA, who recognized singer/entertainer Sohan Weerasinghe, in a very special way, by presenting him with a Lifetime Achievement Award, in Los Angeles, last month, are working on three more major events.
The first is scheduled for 9th September and they are calling it ‘Tribute to Legends.’

The show will feature Suneera Sumanga (representing maestro Amaradewa), Mohan Raj (representing his father R. Muttusamy), Ishaq Baig (representing his father Mohideen Baig) and Mario Ananda (representing his father Greshan Ananda).
On 4th November, their ‘Family Night’ will bring into the spotlight the band Infinity, along with Supun Perera and Kanchana Anuradhi.
Their second ‘Family Night,’ on 19th November, should be a crowd puller as Yohani de Silva, of ‘Manike Mage Hithe,’ fame will be featured, with Hector Dias and D Major.
And, guess what! On Wednesday, 19th July, Yohani is scheduled to give a special performance at the Nulum Pokuna Theatre, in Colombo.
